item.title: Planning for Procrastinators: A Minimalist Approach That Works
item.description: If you struggle with overthinking or procrastination, this minimalist planning method is for you. Learn how to stop stalling and start acting with simple, strategic planning that actually works.

item.title: The 100-Day Sprint: How to Tackle Ambitious Goals with Strategy
item.description: Learn how the 100-day sprint method helps you conquer big goals by breaking them down into focused, achievable steps. Use tools like Stratify and GoalHacker to make it automatic.

item.title: Why Most To-Do Lists Fail (And How Strategic Planning Fixes It)
item.description: Most to-do lists fail because they lack strategy. Learn why this common productivity habit breaks down and how strategic planning — with tools like Stratify — can make your tasks actually get done.

item.title: Why Your Goals Feel Vague — and How to Make Them Tactical
item.description: If your goals feel vague, overwhelming, or hard to act on, you’re not alone. Learn how to transform foggy ambition into a clear, tactical plan with this step-by-step framework.
